quote: People ignore design that ignores people.
author: Frank Chimero, Designer

quote: When UX doesn’t consider ALL users, shouldn’t it be known as “SOME User Experience” or… SUX
author: Billy Gregory, Senior Accessibility Engineer

quote: The next big thing is the one that makes the last big thing usable.
author: Blake Ross, Co-creator of Mozilla Firefox

quote: Rule of thumb for UX: More options, more problems.
author: Scott Belsky, Chief Product Officer

quote: Design isn’t finished until somebody is using it.
author: Brenda Laurel, PhD, Independent Scholar

quote: How do I explain what I do at a party? The short version is that I say I humanize technology.
author: Fred Beecher, Director of UX, The Nerdery

quote: UI is the saddle, the stirrups, & the reins. UX is the feeling you get being able to ride the horse.
author: Dain Miller, Web Developer

quote: Design is everywhere. From the dress you’re wearing to the smartphone you’re holding, it’s design.
author: Samadara Ginige, Designer and Developer

quote: If you think good design is expensive, you should look at the cost of bad design.
author: Dr. Ralf Speth, Chief Executive Officer, Jaguar Land Rover

quote: Design used to be the seasoning you’d sprinkle on for taste; now it’s the flour you need at the start of the recipe.
author: John Maeda, Designer and Technologist

quote: Accidents often produce the best solutions…Only you can recognize the difference between an accident and your original intent.
author: Jennifer Morla, Creative Director

quote: If we want users to like our software, we should design it to behave like a likeable person: respectful, generous and helpful.
author: Alan Cooper, Software Designer and Programmer

quote: Every great design begins with an even better story.
author: Lorinda Mamo, Designer / Creative Director

quote: If I had an hour to solve a problem and my life depended on the solution, I would spend the first 55 minutes determining the proper question to ask, for once I know the proper question, I could solve the problem in less than five minutes.
author: Albert Einstein, Theoretical Physicist
